text: Vyaja khanare loka ubhe rahanara nahita. Parantu taseca jasa to manusya ubha rahato jyala saitana bilaguna vedasara banavito. He asasathi ki he mhanata asata ki vyaparadekhila vyajapramaneca ahe. Vastavika allahane vyapara halala (vaidha) kela ani vyajala harama. Ani jo manusya apalyajavala alela allahaca upadesa aikuna (vyaja ghenyapasuna) thambala tara tyacyasathi te ahe je ho'una gele ani tyaca mamala allahacya supurda ahe ani tarihi jo (haramakade) paratala, to jahannami ahe ani ase loka nehami tyataca paduna rahatila
